dimensions: Warp x Weft: 10.2 x 7 cm (4 x 2 3/4 in.)
title: The Blue Boy (c. 1770) by Thomas Gainsborough (1727-1788)
description: Woven souvenir based on the painting 'The Blue Boy' (c. 1770) by Thomas Gainsborough (1727-1788). "W.W.L. CO. 1961 DEL. H.H." appears below the portrait.  Blue, black, red, and salmon on white warp.
name: Souvenir ribbon portrait
